snippet: The producers behind an effort to finish “The Other Side of the Wind,” Welles’s incomplete final film, are exploring other options.
abstract: Leaders of project to finish Orson Welles last film The Other Side of the Wind move to 'Plan C' after Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign fails to raise $2 million needed for postproduction costs; project leader Filip Jan Rymsza says they will use what was raised to start next phase and get rest of money from unnamed private investor; campaign sum of $406,405 includes last minute $50,000 from DreamWorks Animation movie director Dean Deblois,
lead_paragraph: The producers behind an effort to finish “The Other Side of the Wind,” Welles’s incomplete final film, are exploring other options.

headline.main: Orson Welles’s Last Film Hits a Bump in Production, but Project Continues
headline.print_headline: Plan for Last Welles Film Hits Snag, but Carries On
